description: This table contains Home Health/Hospice episode information. It contains the noadd single items for the Episode. These items are entered by a user as part of the Intake encounter.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the episode.

columns.name: TEAM_ASSIGNMENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Team assignment category list selection for the episode.  Links to category table ZC_TEAM_ASSIGNMENT.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DME_CO_ID
columns.description: This column contains the durable medical equipment supplier for the patient's episode. The column links to table RX_PHR.

columns.name: LABORATORY_ID
columns.description: The unique id of the laboratory.

columns.name: LABORATORY_ID_LLB_NAME
columns.description: Interface laboratory name.

columns.name: HOME_INFUSN_CO_ID
columns.description: ID for the home infusion company for the episode.  Links to table RX_PHR.

columns.name: HOME_CARE_CITY
columns.description: City in the home care address for the episode.

columns.name: HOME_CARE_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category list selection for home care state for the episode. Links to category table ZC_STATE.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HOME_CARE_ZIP
columns.description: ZIP code for the home care address for the episode.

columns.name: HOME_CARE_PHONE
columns.description: Phone number for the home care address for the episode.

columns.name: PAT_WEIGHT
columns.description: Patient weight entered for the episode.

columns.name: PAT_HEIGHT
columns.description: Patient height entered for the episode.

columns.name: CARE_PLAN_ID
columns.description: This item stores the careplan ID.

columns.name: EPISODE_DELETED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Depending on whether the episode is deleted, this item stores the category list selection for the episode. Links to category table ZC_EPISODE_DELETED.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Deleted


Not Deleted

columns.name: OUTPAT_ADMSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Is this an outpatient admission?  Links to category table ZC_OUTPAT_ADMSN.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: INTERPRETER_NEED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Is an interpreter needed for the episode?  Links to category table ZC_OUTPAT_ADMSN.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OUTPAT_ADMSN_C_NAME

columns.name: TRIAGE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Triage code category list selection for the episode.  Links to category table ZC_TRIAGE_CODE.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REFERRAL_RECVD_TIM
columns.description: Time the referral for this episode was received.

columns.name: REFERRAL_AUTHOR
columns.description: Author of the referral for this episode.

columns.name: RFL_AUTHOR_PHONE
columns.description: Referral author phone number.

columns.name: REASON_DISCH_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason for discharge category list selection for the episode.  Links to category table ZC_REASON_DISCH.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HH_EPISODE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Home Health episode type category list selection for the episode.  Links to category table ZC_HH_EPS_TYPE.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HC_ADM_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the status of the Home Care episode admission.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Admitted


Discharged


Pending Admit


Non-Admit


Discarded

columns.name: HOSPICE_ELEC_DT
columns.description: Hospice Election Date

columns.name: HOSPICE_REV_DT
columns.description: Holds the Hospice Revocation Date

columns.name: HC_ADM_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the source the patient was admitted from.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HC_DC_DISPOSITION_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the patient's discharge disposition.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: NUM_PREV_EPSD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the Previous Number of Consecutive Home Health Episodes


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


NONE


ONE EPISODE


Two or More Episodes


Unknown

columns.name: RFL_SRC_RPT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains a customer defined list of referral sources.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: HSPC_DC_REAS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the reason for discharge for a hospice admission.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PRIM_DX_RPT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Custom item for customers to fill in.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: EPISODE_TYPE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the episode type.

columns.name: COMP_ASMT_COMP_DTTM
columns.description: This item marks the instant at which the hospice comprehensive assessment was first completed. This happens automatically when all sections of the comprehensive assessment have been documented at least once.

columns.name: COMP_ASMT_COMP_CSN
columns.description: This column stores the contact serial number (CSN) of the patient encounter in which the comprehensive assessment was first completed. That is, the first encounter closed in which all of the sections of the comprehensive assessment have been documented at least once.

columns.name: HH_LINKED_UIC_ID
columns.description: In traveler mode each patient will have one episode per unit. This item allows an episode to be linked to a particular unit. Hence, facilitating retrieval of episode information of patients assigned to a specific unit.

columns.name: HH_LINKED_UIC_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the name of the military unit's record.

columns.name: HOSPICE_EFF_DT
columns.description: The date the hospice agency began taking care of the patient.

columns.name: PECOS_COMPLY_YN
columns.description:
This column stores whether the episode is PECOS compliant. An episode is PECOS compliant if all necessary providers (referring provider, plan of care provider) are PECOS enrolled.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: HOME_CARE_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the county of the patient's home care address. The home care address is the address where the patient will be receiving home health or hospice care.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HSPC_PRIOR_DAYS_ON_SVC
columns.description: Stores the number of CMS-qualified days the patient was in hospice care prior to this admission - This number persists between episodes, but resets to 0 after 60 days discharged.

columns.name: HH_COVCHG_IND_DT
columns.description: This item is used to flag a Home Health episode as needing a coverage change. When the coverage change workflow is completed, this date is removed.

columns.name: HH_COVCHG_IND_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the new primary coverage for a coverage change. When the coverage change workflow is completed, this ID is removed.

columns.name: DISCH_SOURCE_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Stores the contact serial number (CSN) of the encounter from which this episode's Discharge Date, Disposition, and Reason for Discharge are populated.

columns.name: HOME_CARE_COUNTRY_2_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the country of the patient's home care address. The home care address is the address where the patient will be receiving home health or hospice care.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HOME_CARE_HOUSE_NUMBER
columns.description: This column stores the house number of the patient's home care address. The home care address is the address where the patient will be receiving home health or hospice care.

columns.name: HOME_CARE_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the district of the patient's home care address. The home care address is the address where the patient will be receiving home health or hospice care.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HC_ADDR_LATITUDE
columns.description: The geocoded latitude for the home care address in numerical degrees with up to 6 decimals of accuracy.

columns.name: HC_ADDR_LONGITUDE
columns.description: The geocoded longitude for the home care address in numerical degrees with up to 6 decimals of accuracy.

columns.name: HC_ADDR_GEO_RATING
columns.description: The HC_ADDR_GEO_RATING rates the accuracy of latitude and longitude for the home care address. The rating is a calculated value determined by taking the lesser of the request-to-response granularity and vendor confidence scores. A is a perfect match to house number with perfect vendor confidence. B is equivalent to a street level specificity or a vendor confidence level in the 100-90 range. Ratings less than that are at best city or county specific and degrade in alphabetical order until E.

columns.name: EPI_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Current status of this episode.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Resolved


Deleted

columns.name: COVCHG_IND_PAT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The discharge disposition recorded for a truncated hospital account following a coverage change.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HC_DC_DISPOSITION_C_NAME

columns.name: COVCHG_IND_HH_COVCHG_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of coverage change needed on the Home Health episode.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Create PPS

columns.name: INBASKET_MSG
columns.description: InBasket Message IDs within this episode.

columns.name: UNKNOWN_REF_PROV_YN
columns.description:
Set if the referring provider is unidentified.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OUTPAT_ADMSN_C_NAME

columns.name: HC_COMP_ASMT_OVRD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item, when populated, may override the default comprehensive assessment configured for a patient's Hospice intake department. The department needs to map the value populated in this item with the new comprehensive assessment to use.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
